cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("reroute")

	REROUTE("ns", "ds", "")
	REROUTE("ns", "", "")
	REROUTE("", "ds", "")
	REROUTE("", "", "dst")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: reroute
processors:
  - reroute:
      tag: reroute_to_ns_ds_5bfc7d00
      namespace: ns
      dataset: ds
  - reroute:
      tag: reroute_to_ns_170927d9
      namespace: ns
  - reroute:
      tag: reroute_to_ds_3ded221c
      dataset: ds
  - reroute:
      tag: reroute_to_dst_0d5ebc88
      destination: dst
